definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]

sentences.english: Who shall give account to him that is ready to judge the quick and the dead.
sentences.chinese: 他們必在那將要審判活人死人的主面前交帳。

sentences.english: Should the Lord come back today to settle accounts with me, what would be His comments for me?
sentences.chinese: 倘若主今天回來要我交帳，我得到的評價會是什麼？

sentences.english: Steward has to report to his master at the end.
sentences.chinese: 管家要負責，最後要向主人交帳。

sentences.english: Little young to be my wonderful, hard drive, loyalty pay off.
sentences.chinese: 小青年待我極好，開車賣力，交帳忠誠。
